If cancer is in the maxillary sinus, treatment may include the following:         -  High-dose radiation therapy with or without surgery.    - A clinical trial of fractionated radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before surgery or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy after surgery or other cancer treatment.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.
